reviews.review_text: Easy to assemble. part are organized. just pay attention when placing side panels that you fave them correctly before snapping into place. I did one wrong and it took a few minutes to get it back out to correct facing for shelf attachment

reviews.title: Looks nice, but not very sturdy
reviews.review_text: I purchased three of these shelving units. So far I have assembled one of the three and placed it in my garage to store various containers of liquids. The shelves look nice and were easy to assemble. While the framing in steel, it is thin steel. It would not be difficult to bend the frame. I didn't expect steel shelving to come in a box labelled "fragile". For the under $30 price I paid, the shelves are okay and will server the desired purpose. If you want sturdy, this is not the item to buy. One minor complaint about the fully assemble unit is that the upper half is not actually attached to the lower half. Eventually, I will use eight half inch bolts to secure the upper and lower halves together. I may return the two unopened boxes.

reviews.title: Flimsy
reviews.review_text: This is two separate units. Not one long unit as pictured. It is not snap together. You will need a hammer. They provide gloves. Use them because the edges are sharp. I did slice my thumb which was my fault because for not wearing the gloves. These units are by no means heavy duty. You can easily bend/twist each section. The shelf board is barely stronger than corrugated cardboard. It's not difficult to assemble by any means though. It's just not what I needed. I wanted something to organize my basement but I don't think these will withstand much weight. I would not buy these again. Plastic would be much more sturdy than this.

went to put it together and once I was on the last step I noticed I am 1 short of the shorter pieces (number 3) and 1 extra of the longer piece (number 2). so now it's 1 shelf short at first i thought it would be no big deal being a shelf short but after put together its not as sturdy as the first one i put together with all the shelves. if it had all the needed parts it would be a 4 to possible 5 stars. overall the product is good quality

reviews.title: Only for light weight items.
reviews.review_text: Assembly is a bit difficult but use a mallot hammer with two people to assemble. As you build up, bottem to top no screws are needed but any metal must be settled into sockets for all four corners and for all five shelves. As I built it, I discovered it was a previous returned item and 2 corner metal posts (of 4) were slightly bent. I couldn't assembe the upper shelves because connections for metal slots became slightly off from corner dents. I returned it to the store. Examine all parts before you build, if NO DENTS, you could build all five levels. 2 people to assemble. Wood shelves are very thin, so is for very light stuff on each shelf. This is not good for medium or heavy containers. I would say each shelf could hold no more than 10 pounds, like towels, blankets and super light hardware, like light weight Christmas decorations.
ok for the price. an upgrade from wire shelves. paint scratches easily. the rivets are a bit tight on the short side, requiring some excessive force to hammer together.

reviews.title: worth the money
reviews.review_text: it's not super strong or pretty but it definitely get the job done. assembly would have been easier with two people. AND make sure you have a rubber mallet for assembly. I used a hammer and I bent it even being careful. It doesn't seem to effect the shelf's integrity much though
4/5 Rating. It serves it's purpose, but quality not impress. 20 Gallons Fish Tank, its kinda sturdy.

reviews.title: use to organize
reviews.review_text: they are what i expected. i wish i could order parts instead of whole unit so i could place more shelves on one
The flat "wood" part of the shelf is cheesy cheap press board. Have a side support missing. The silver upright supports are nice.
went to put together and the Metal started bending will be returning.

reviews.title: Cheap
reviews.review_text: The wood boards are so cheap and bend with the littlest effort.

I'd like to talk to the ones that said it was easy to assemble. I guess it would be if you had instructions, and not just pictures! I tried to get the manual but the sites weren't available, So , I'm trying to put it together!!!!

reviews.title: worth the (minimal) challenge
reviews.review_text: A few of the corners were not manufactured the best, but we made them work. The problem seemed to be isolated to one box and was a slight spacing issue with the peg. It should not affect the overall use or look of the shelves. They are nice quality and super easy assembly for the cost. This is the 2nd set that we have purchased.

reviews.title: It's acceptable
reviews.review_text: well, to start 2 of the shorter shelving braces were damaged and unable to be installed. 2nd, it is not a sturdy steel. as some if the legs were spread beyond 90 degrees, I used my hands to squeeze them together. Beyond this it is acceptable. It stands and holds items. It is decent for the price and will serve it's purpose once I have all the pieces.

reviews.title: not at all what is pictured
reviews.review_text: these are study but you are buying three separate shelves

reviews.title: Comes in lots of pieces
reviews.review_text: I was hoping it was put together more and more sturdy.

Thought it was bigger to hold things i needed for storage but it wasn't so I decided to switch it up but other than that, Works for what I need it to. Decided to put workout equipment on it and tools. Also smaller clear containers fit nicely on it.
I think the boards should be a bit thicker and the piece in the middle that the board lays on we had to bend the ends to get it to stay in place. Overall it is a good storage shelf.

reviews.title: Small, flimsy and no instructions to assemble.
reviews.review_text: Small, flimsy and no instructions to assemble. This is not a shelving unit that will hold much weight so as long as you're not looking to put anything of weight on it it might work for you.

reviews.title: Decent shelves for storage
reviews.review_text: Bought a 2 pack. The shelves would work nicely for storage, but second box is missing one leg piece. Can't figure out how to get ahold of the company for the missing leg so that these shelves are fully usable.

reviews.title: Overpriced
reviews.review_text: It is easy to assemble not too tall or heavy. Having a rubber mallet will make everything a breeze. It doesnât feel like âsteelâ more like some type of cheaper metal but its still ok. Thats why i said its overpiced this is worth more like $90.00 not $140. Also i recieved 2 out of 3 of the boxes on one day and the 3rd one the next day! So weird but im not thwnonly one so if that happens to you give it a day.
The stability of the shelving unit is not really for shelves to be used in the garage.
If you need for big boxes you will have a lot of shelves in the box in the end, it just depends for what you need and it could be perfect

reviews.title: Mini Storage Rack
reviews.review_text: It's a tiny mini storage rack. I can only have a dozen soda in every shelf. Be careful what you're ordering. Check the size.

reviews.title: Bought something different
reviews.review_text: It would be ok if you want to store books on but as for basement or garage the shelves are way too narrow to put anything on

reviews.title: Not the size I anticipated.
reviews.review_text: Much smaller than anticipated. Sent it back immediately. That said, shipping was LIGHTNING FAST and return was incredibly easy.

reviews.title: Read the description
reviews.review_text: They are as described....but nothing more. These are not heavy-duty storage, but they are fine for basic organizing. I've used them in the closet of my home office for office supplies, and it's appropriate. Some of legs

reviews.title: Small bin storage
reviews.review_text: Great for holding comforts, light boxes, small bins. I won't trust shelves holding 330 lbs.

reviews.title: Metal shelves
reviews.review_text: They were easy to put together, though they did not look like the picture.
I'd have given it 5 Stars all the wsy through except the box did not had assembly instructions.
Easy for this 67 year old woman to assemble on her own!
Very thin. Metal and shelves. Much smaller than you think

reviews.title: quick to assemble minimal tools
reviews.review_text: you must watch very closely that the pins are in the slots during assembly
